Text:

I had a clean install in, then applied this and it won't work. I get up to the pop-up screen with the four playable charcters (before the actual logos) and then the typical "Borderlands 2 has stopped working". And yes I did move the cracks.

I'll uninstall, reinstall and then apply it again and post my results.
Yup, still a no-go for me. I moved the crack, re-installed Skidrow's, and it worked fine. Installed yours, moved the crack, and nothing. Exact same error.
The only DLC that appears is the Premiere Pack, and I don't even get the Mechromancer, just the keys, weapons and the relic. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Ignore everything I said it was a fucking directory error >.>

I ignored the first couple but its happening for every file after about 75%.  This is the only torrent that I've had this happen to. 

Currently I deleted the file and have started to re-d/l it hoping that maybe it was something in my orginal download. 

Any help or insight would be appreciated, thanks guys

use "borderlands2.exe" to run the game. Not the launcher.
